```{r}
country<-c()

for (i in colnames(imp)[-1]){
  country<-append(country,rep(i,12))
}

vol<-c()
for (i in 2:length(colnames(imp))){
  vol<-append(vol,as.list(imp[,i][-1]))
}

c<-"Month"


creimp<-data.frame(Month = rep(imp$Month,length(colnames(imp))-1),
                   Country = country,
                   Volume = vol)
```

```{r}
cimp<-imp%>%
  pivot_longer()
```
